meeting_request.purpose: Struggling to understand religious beliefs in a post-Christian world
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Noah, a senior majoring in Religion. Last semester was really challenging — I struggled with understanding faith in a post-Christian world, and I’m still grappling with how to reconcile my faith with the new beliefs and values emerging in society. I’ve tried talking to professors, but they don’t seem to know how to address my specific concerns. I’m interested in exploring how I can engage with religious studies in a more nuanced way and learn how to think critically about faith in the modern world. I hope to schedule a meeting to discuss how to build skills and perspectives that will help me navigate this challenging period.
